column4: I think you can change it through the Advanced Settings application. It's downloadable from the software center.
I checked it now. It's changeable through the Advanced Settings application, yes. Search for "Advanced Settings" in the software center.

gnome-session: Depends: gnome-session-bin (>= 3.2.1-0ubuntu8) but 3.2.1-0ubuntu8 is to be installed
Depends: gnome-session-common (= 3.2.1-0ubuntu8) but 3.2.1-0ubuntu8 is to be installed
these are unmet dependencies
I never figured out how to solve those dependency errors. I guess you have another question that needs answering now. ;)
